body.p:
Spring Station Ky
16 July/61
G. W. Johnson Esqr
Georgetown
Scott Co
Dear Sir

I have had no opportunity of seeing you lately on the subject of the money due me or of learning what chance there may be of you being able to raise the amt; I am sorry to be obliged thus to urge the thing but necessity is a hard Master as they say & I am myself pressed to meet my own engagements -- Can Mr Thomas not get the money out of Bank where he is doing his business? I hear that money is not hard to raise out of Bank if one is not a borrower as I have been obliged to be --

Yours in haste
R Aitcheson Alexander
